ingredients.item: 610g pack essential Waitrose British Lamb 24 Meatballs
300g pack Love Life Giant Wholegrain Couscous

instructions.step: Mix the oil, half the mint and the cumin in a large bowl. Add the meatballs and toss to coat evenly. Thread the lamb, alternating with the peppers, on to 8 skewers. Place on a foil-lined grill pan and grill for 15 minutes, turning every now and then until thoroughly cooked with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, cook the couscous in boiling water for 8 minutes, then drain and cool under cold water. Stir in the remaining mint, pine nuts and yogurt, and season well.
Serve the couscous with the lamb skewers and salad.
